title: The 'Aabharana Vanam' Bangle: Emerald and Diamond Floral Splendor
materials: VS Clarity Diamonds (Approx. 2.5ctw). Meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Intricate filigree design resembling a 'Vanam' (forest) with floral motifs. The central Emerald is bezel-set and surrounded by pav√©-set diamonds. The openwork design adds lightness and elegance. Features traditional South Indian floral detailing alongside modern diamond setting techniques.
colors: and Sparkling White Diamonds. This color combination represents prosperity and good fortune in Telugu traditions.
occasions: and special occasions where a touch of regal elegance is desired. Also suited for modern cocktail parties and galas.
description: This bangle, 'Aabharana Vanam,' embodies the perfect fusion of tradition and modernity. Its delicate floral design, sparkling diamonds, and vibrant emerald create a captivating piece of art. The Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity and a lustrous shine. More than just jewelry, it's a statement piece reflecting timeless South Indian elegance and contemporary sophistication.
